Bilgewater Fox Snake

10 HP, 10 STR, 16 DEX, 12 CHA, coil and bite (d8), flailing thrash (d4 Blast)

• Tries to make friends, doesn't mind if they're dead.

• Can traverse land but is too anxious to do so.

• Whines pleadingly if rejected.

• Whisks you off to a Friend Tea Party on Critical Damage.
